parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Game 2 Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets whether or not the object is visible even if the tree is collapsed.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Some Old Editor Command</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''setVisibleIfTreeCollapsed''' [object, visible]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [object, visible]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> object: [[Editor Object | EditorObject]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> visible: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_map '''setVisibleIfTreeCollapsed''' ["_unit_0", true]</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> -
</value></part></template>
